title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Length and Measurement Learning for Students with Mild Intellectual Disabilities: Model-

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Apply the MEA (Model-Eliciting Activity) framework when designing length and measurement activities tailored to the cognitive level of students with mild intellectual disabilities
Develop measurement learning scenarios using real-life problems (e.g., calculating the shortest route to school) based on Google Maps
Provide learner-tailored feedback and revision strategies through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
